class Solution(object):
    def minimumOperations(self, nums, target):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :type target: List[int]
        :rtype: int
        """
        n = len(nums)
        nums += [0]
        target += [0]
        

        
        diff1 = [nums[0]] + [nums[i+1]-nums[i] for i in range(n)]
        diff2 = [target[0]] + [target[i+1]-target[i] for i in range(n)]
        

                
        #rint(diff1,diff2)
                

                

        
        diff = [abs(diff1[i]-diff2[i]) for i in range(len(diff1))]
        
        
        return sum(diff) // 2
